description: Shadow Hunter character definitions - Base game + Expansion

ability.name: Teleport
ability.description: When moving, you may choose to move to the area card paired with your current one, instead of rolling the dice.

ability.name: Lightning
ability.description: Once per game, when your turn starts, you can pick a player and damage them for the roll of a 6-sided die.

ability.name: Demolish
ability.description: Once per game, when your turn starts, you can pick a player and damage them for the roll of a 4-sided die.

ability.name: Deceit
ability.description: When given a Hermit Card, you may lie about your identity. You do not have to reveal your identity to use this.

ability.name: Suck Blood
ability.description: If you attack a player and inflict damage, you heal 2 points of your own damage.

ability.name: Counterattack
ability.description: After you are attacked by a player, you can counterattack them immediately.

allie.name: Allie
allie.win_condition: You're not dead when the game is over.

ability.name: Mother's Love
ability.description: Once per game, you may fully heal your damage.

bob.name: Bob
bob.win_condition: You have 5 or more equipment cards.

ability.name: Robbery
ability.description: If your attack inflicts 2 or more damage, you may steal an Equipment card instead of giving damage. (7-8 players: take all equipment from killed target.)

charles.name: Charles
charles.win_condition: At the time you kill another character, the total number of dead characters is 3 or more.

ability.name: Bloody Feast
ability.description: After you attack a character, you can attack the same character again by giving yourself 2 points of damage.

daniel.name: Daniel
daniel.win_condition: You must be the first player to kill, or be killed.

ability.name: Scream
ability.description: You must reveal your identity when another character dies. You cannot reveal your identity at any other time.

ability.name: Chain of Forbidden Curse
ability.description: Once per game, when your turn starts, you can choose a player and permanently void their special ability.

ability.name: Dynamite Nurse
ability.description: Once per game, when your turn starts, you can set the damage of any player to 7.

ability.name: Ghostly Barrier
ability.description: Once per game, prevent all damage until your next turn.

ability.name: Murder Ray
ability.description: When your turn starts, you can give 3 damage to one player who is at the Underworld Gate.

ability.name: Horn of War Outbreak
ability.description: When you attack, you only roll the 4-sided die and inflict the amount of damage rolled.

ability.name: Multiplication
ability.description: Once per game at turn end, gain extra turns equal to current dead character count.

agnes.name: Agnes
agnes.win_condition: When the game is over, if the player to your immediate right wins, you also win.

ability.name: Capriccio
ability.description: Once per game at turn start, change win condition to favor the player on your left instead.

bryan.name: Bryan
bryan.win_condition: Eliminate a character with 13+ HP through direct attack, or be on the Erstwhile Altar when game ends.

ability.name: My GOD!!!
ability.description: Must reveal identity when killing characters with 12 or fewer health points via attack.

catherine.name: Catherine
catherine.win_condition: Die first, or be one of the last two characters standing.

ability.name: Stigmata
ability.description: Each turn start, heal 1 damage point if applicable.

david.name: David
david.win_condition: Equip three or more specific White cards simultaneously: Spear of Longinus, Holy Robe, Silver Rosary, or Talisman.

ability.name: Grave Digger
ability.description: Once per game, obtain any equipment card from discard piles, even outside your turn.
